name: Chad Wood
text: I had a great experience with Johnson and Hayes.  I went in after suffering severe pain for 3 weeks resulting from a recent injury.  I tried a chiropractor first, which did not help to solve my problem only temporarily help relieve the pain.  I went to see the physical therapists at J&H in hopes of fixing the underlying issue, not just relieving the pain.  Believe it or not, my injury and pain were resolved after my first visit!  Ethan saw me and diagnosed and treated underlying issue which i had never expected, and after a short session I left with an appointment to return in a week.  The next day I started to realize that my pain was gone and I was beginning to feel good again.  Thanks J&H, and thank you Ethan, for getting me well again.  Highly recommended!!!  Clean facility, friendly and knowledgeable staff.

resp.text: Thank you, Chad! We appreciate you choosing J&H.

name: Julia wilhelm
text: J & H is a great place for therapy.  My family members have all benefited form their experiences there.  Lately, my 89 year old father was treated there and he had a caring therapist who did her utmost to help him in a friendly, relaxed manner.  She was very professional and  in tune to his abilities and stamina.  The atmosphere at the facility is warm and friendly and the open floor plan is refreshing.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Julia.  We're fortunate to have the opportunity to work with great patients such as you and your family.  We'll be here whenever you need us!

name: Loretta Lynne Weninegar
text: I am so appreciative for the kind and caring group of folks at J&H...especially Jared! He and his co-workers have worked diligently to help me recover from months of pain and I am on my way to "happy and well" again! Thanks so much!

text: I relocated to Huntsville in April of 2019.  After Home Health and working with 3 other Physical Therapists, a friend of my Grandaughters, who is attending  college in Montgomery to obtain his doctorate in Physical Therapy, recommended Johnson & Hayes and what a wonderful experience it is.  My strength and balance improve with every session.  Thank you again, Kendall and Johnson & Hayes.

resp.text: Margo, thank you for trusting us with your care. We appreciate you and are thankful you are doing better.

name: Clay Peake
text: I have been to almost every PT in the city, Nesin, TOC, Sports Med, Mandeville, P3; all working on a chronic knee issue over the last 15 years or so. They all basically have the same set of exercises and similar facilities but J&H just seemed better; better staff, better atmosphere, better equipment. They have the right mix of relaxed attitude but also, hey we've got an hour, let's improve your function today. My therapist Josh was like that, first of all very knowledgeable, relaxed but all business, listened to me but didn't let me drive the train; just struck a good balance all the way around. And actually I learned some new exercises that really helped, and dry needling was a first which I think was the thing that really gave me the most benefit. So anyway, obviously I recommend J&H if you want a no-nonsense approach to rehab in a very welcoming and comfortable atmosphere supported by some knowledgeable, professional therapists.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the review, Clay.  Josh is extremely knowledgable and he works hard to personalize his approach to every patient.  We're excited your time at J&H has resulted in improvement and we look forward to continuing to work with you so you can get back to doing what you enjoy!

name: Joan Webb
text:
I am very pleased with my experience at J&H.  Susan D.  has worked very hard to get me more stable on my feet.  I am walking straighter and more up right.  She has
found workable exercises to improve my mobility.  At 81 learning to walk seems to be a simple task, but breaking old habits is not an easy chore.  She has been very patient and l appreciate her effort in my behalf.

resp.text: Joan - Thank you for your review and feedback.  We are passionate about providing personalized care for each patient and we are excited to see that Susan was able to partner with you to develop a plan of care that worked well for you.  Johnson & Hayes is here if you ever need us in the future!

I have watched all of the therapists, even the ones treating the other patients. They all deserve 5 Gold Stars. Thank you J&H. Melinda Thompson, MD

I don't take advil daily anymore! So great to be learning techniques that will enable me to have the active lifestyle I want long-term without invasive/expensive alternatives. The front desk folks are also proactively helpful; like any great place, they figured out my insurance coverage, and it has been easy to get in and schedule appointments around work.

text: Dr. Ray has done a total knee and hip replacement for me and excellent results.  He has done joint replacement on multiple family members.  I highly recommend him.

name: A A M C O Vestavia
text: Dr. Ray performed an emergency surgery on my right hand and wrist in 2006 and did a excellent job. I drove from Birmingham to Anniston every Dr's visit to see him and my results were way better than initially expected by him and myself.  Due to the injury, it took some time to rehab but I got back to what I loved doing.  All these years later, my hand and wrist are doing great.  Thank you Dr. Ray.  I HIGHLY recommend Dr. Ray!!!

name: Margaret Wilson
text:
There may be some bogus reviews on here but maybe this last lady's review is also bogus. There is absolutely no reason anyone should have to wait in a orthopedics office for more than two hours with an appointment. I say they're in pain for 2.5 hrs after I scheduled my appointment 3 weeks before. I was in a lot of pain at that time but they claimed they couldn't get me in earlier. Customer service in this office is non existent other than collecting Co-pays.
Dr. Lawler is not as competent as done people think. He did an ankle surgery on me that was going to take me 2 weeks to be back to normal according to what he said. 3 months later I'm still in pain and it's still swollen. I truly believe that some prime are good at customer service and some need to work on a factory somewhere where talking to customers is not an requirement.

name: Lilian Wallace
text:
My daughter broke her ankle and Dr Ray did her surgery. He is excellent.
I highly recommend Dr. Ray.

name: Diane Harris
text:
IN RESPONSE TO MARGARET WILSON - IF YOU ARE REFERRING TO MY REVIEW AS BEING BOGUS, SORRY BUT YOU ARE SADLY MISTAKEN. THERE ISN'T ONE WORD THAT I POSTED THAT ISN'T TRUE! I CAN, HOWEVER, SPOT BS WHEN I SEE IT!!

I certainly hope people can differentiate between legitimate and bogus reviews.  I have been a patient of CORE Orthopedics and Sports Medicine since day one - eleven years! You will not find a better run, more efficient doctors office with more friendly employees. In the past eleven years I have never, EVER experienced or seen any of the employees be rude to ANYONE. I take some of the comments that have been made very personally, because the employees at this office are like family to me. I know their character, I know how they treat people, and I know the standard they are held to!

I cannot comment personally about Dr Lawler because I have never used his. However, I have several friends/family that have used him and every one of them have been completely happy with the level of care they received from him.

I have been Dr Ray's patient for the past eleven years. I have to be the first to admit that I am not the easiest patient to deal with,  and I  have had way more than my share of difficult issues to have to deal with over the years. Never once has there been a situation that couldn't be dealt with. Throughout my many numerous (too many to even be able to count) surgeries that I have had to go through, Dr Ray has always done a fabulous job. He deeply cares about his patients and their wellbeing.  He strives for excellence in the operating room for the best possible outcome for his patients.  He has a wonderful bedside manner and treats his patients as if they are family. His is the only practice in the area where you can schedule an appointment within a few days instead of having to wait a few weeks.

name: Mastrianni Marshall
text: The customer service is horrible. Dr. Ray IS NOT a good doctor. He will guess about your injury. I went there last wear about my knee and he gave me a shot that didn’t work & had to pay $65 for nothing. I went last week for my knee and paid $65 just for him to tell me to get a MRI done. After the MRI I thought I was going back for a follow up and the results they tried to get me to pay another $65 before I even went back there and I wasn’t going for it. WOULDN'T RECOMMEND YOU TO GO HERE.

name: Colin Brooks
text: Front desk personnel is TERRIBLE!! Dr. Lawler may not be the best orthopedic doctor but his front desk employees are really rude and get loud with customers. My mother was in their office and I was with her she had an appointment and a referral from her doctor. She sustained an injury 2 days ago that's when she made the appointment. After paying the co pay they told her she couldn't be seen because of her referral status. My parents are retired military, disabled veterans that have Tricare as their insurance. I truly believe that doctor's on the area, not just here, do not want to take on a Tricare patient because they may take up a slot that someone with better insurance can. It's a shame how the employees at this doctor's office act towards military veterans. After trying to get a referral from Tricare finally someone from the back figured out that they can get one from Tricare s web page and she was seen. I truly wish that we had more options as far as doctor's that take Tricare in this area.

name: Lola Nelson
text:
I guess if you have better insurance than Tricare prime ( Military/ Veteran) he may spend more than 5 minutes of his precious time talking to you, other than that we had to wait 2 hrs and seen him for less than 7 minutes.
Tricare prime doesn't pay doctors as well as other insurances but sometimes it is all that  veterans can afford and even outside of veterans day should be respected.

name: I.O.U
text: Thank you for the great customer service and professional character you give great care and understanding your staff is awesome

name: Ronnie Sollars
text: I b glad win im dun wit dess Clowns!!!

text: I have been going here for 4 weeks and my therapist Corey is the best. He has excellent customer service. He is patient and very thorough about my treatment and my exercises. He not only answered my questions but also my family member questions as well. The ladies at the front desk are a joy to see each morning. They are very patient and have great customer service. Always a smile. Brent has excellent customer service he always jump in for encouragement. I am so glad my Doctor referred me here.

resp.text: Latrica, this is great news! We are thrilled your experience with our Wetumpka team was a positive one! Congratulations on all your hard work!

text: Would not have wanted to take this journey without the professional and caring staff at Phoenix!!!! Although therapy is hard work, they encourage you through each day. The office staff is very kind and caring.They're the BEST!!!

text: I was terrified "Rehab" sounded like months of pain and slow recovery, I was so wrong I was a new person in days! I'd recommend Phoenix Rehab to anyone, young or old.  Thank you Brent and staff for everything!

Keep up the good work guys/gals & keep those stupid exercises in rotation so everyone can feel their very best!  : )

name: Rebecca Kirk
text: Let me start by saying I have never been to physical therapy. I was referred by my doctor to see a physical therapist after a wreck I was in and they suggested ATI. After several weeks of coming twice a week I feel like a brand new person. The staff at ATI in Dothan is amazing. They don’t treat you like just another patient. They treat you like family. Their mission is “to exceed customer expectations by providing the highest quality of care in a friendly and encouraging environment “ to say the least, ATI has exceeded their mission. Candice has been more than my physical therapist. She has cheered me on every step of the way and has celebrated every goal I have achieved. She has worked with me for the last several weeks accommodating every one of my needs to regain my strength. Leslie did my evaluation at my first appointment she was very welcoming and understanding. Scheduling my appointments with Perez was very easy. I have a hectic schedule and they went above and beyond to get me in for my first appointment where it was convenient for me. Between all of the amazing staff and the positive environment I was able to regain all of my strength back and continue in my every day life with no pain. I cannot thank Candice and the ATI team enough. ❤️❤️

text: Very comfortable and accommodating atmosphere, friendly therapists, and all around great experience. Would definitely recommend to anyone who needs it.

text: Good location and great people. If you're a sports fan or military the visit is even more interesting. I had an ankle injury that required surgery and 3 months of recovery. text: I had a pretty severe break of three bones in my foot following a motorcycle accident, and Dr. Waldrop and the whole staff at Andrews were amazing! Quick appointment, quick surgery date, lots of follow-ups to make sure my recover/healing was going well, and excellent 'bedside manner'/customer service throughout the entire process. This group is world class, and I feel blessed to have been able to have them help me get healthy again. I'm on the road to recovery and looking forward to playing soccer and riding my motorcycle again very soon!

name: Lexie Corder
text: He is the best surgeon I have ever met and came in contact with. He is such a genuine, kind-hearted person, who takes his time with his patients to make sure they feel listened to and are special. He is very knowledgeable about his specialty and will go above-and-beyond to make sure you can do all the things you love to do. I went to SO many doctors telling me I would never do what I love to do most., dance, ever again. When I met him and started talking to him, he knew exactly how to fix me and knew I had a passion for dance and did absolutely any and everything to get me back to 100% and I am today. I have no problems with my foot I had surgery on and I am teaching several fitness classes and am in my university's dance team. I cannot thank Dr. Norman Waldrop and his staff enough for their constant kindness, determination, and support during this trying time. I love every single one of them and know that they are still changing lives and making the impossible possible to this day and will never stop.

resp.text: Lexie, thank you so much for the kind words.

name: Nathalie Alarcon
text: It was difficult chapter in my life to break my ankle. Dr. Waldrop and his team has helped me tremendously. I am currently in physical therapy and they are absolutely professional with protocol. You have to maintain patient during the healing stage and once you follow directions. I do highly recommend. I pray I don't have to return on any injury in the near future, but if I were to Dr. Waldrop is the one who is the expert specialist on my ankle treatment.

resp.text: Nathalie, I'm so glad you had a great experience! We appreciate your review and look forward to helping you continue to heal.

name: George Larson
text:
Dr. Waldrop is the most kind, caring surgeon I have come across.  I have had multiple opinions of a complex problem and he made me feel the most comfortable by far.  He took the time to explain the options, going through the pros and cons of each.  He makes you feel comfortable from the beginning.  My results were impeccable and will be indebted to him.

His practice is very busy.  No one wants a surgeon that is not busy,  they are that way for a reason.  There is a reason his practice is busy,  its because he is the best.  Remember,  you don't want a surgeon who is not busy!

Thanks again!

name: Nancy Green
text: I highly recommend Dr. Norman Waldrop at Andrews Sports Medicine.  He took his time with me, answered all my questions and is knowledgeable. Five stars for him!

text: I became a patient of Dr. Waldrop’s when I broke my ankle several years ago.  I received excellent care, concern and communication from Dr. Waldrop and his staff at Andrews.  I have joked with Dr. Waldrop that I needed to have him on retainer as I broke my foot again about a year and a half later.  I’ve had two more surgeries on the same foot.  There are not enough accolades for Dr. Waldrop and his staff. They are always friendly,  courteous and take the time to explain everything in detail. I went to another surgeon who assured me that he could relieve the problem. Bad mistake. 8 months and a great amount of pain later, I finally found a new ankle specialist who will try to repair the damage done by the other surgeon. Dr 2aldrop would not see me until I was a year out from first surgery. By then damage might have been irreparable.
IF you can get in to see Dr. Waldrop is is VERY GOOD at his job.

name: Tammy Felix
text: Dr Waldrop was very courteous, understanding, and very knowledgeable. Th nurses, and front desk and radiologist were also kind and helpful

resp.text: Tammy, thank your for trusting in our team. Also, thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience.

name: Tamela Nelson
text: Treated well. Very polite and friendly staff. My family and I would always refer others to seek out Dr. Waldrop for any foot or ankle problems.

resp.text: Tamela, thank you for trusting in me and my team!

name: Pam Dennis
text: Thank to the best doctor ever.  Great job getting me back on my feet!

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome vote of confidence, Pam!

name: Seth Kaufman
text:
Dr Waldrop fixed my stepson’s broken leg.  He made everyone feel very comfortable about a really stressful situation.  We could not have asked for a better experience.

He is a really busy surgeon.  But he always took the time,  even if he was behind in clinic,  to make us feel good about how everything was going.

He is back playing football and about to start basketball and we could ask for anything more.  Thanks!

name: Angela Hardiman
text: I appreciated Dr. Waldrop's expertise regarding my foot issue.Efficient, friendly staff.

resp.text: Ms. Hardiman, thank you for your kind words, and for taking the time to share your experience.

name: ronald kirkland
text: Excellent doctor. Was a pleasure to deal with. Felt very confident that I was getting the best possible care. Dr. Waldrop made certain that all my questions were answered.

name: Debbie Bonds
text:
I was treated with respect and kindness by all employees, from the front staff on back.  Dr. Waldrop was very professional and I feel the surgeries were successful.  I would recommend him, as a matter of fact I have.
Debbie

resp.text: Debbie, thank you so much for your trust and for taking the time to share your experience.

name: Denise Smith
text: Amazing surgeon! Awesome bedside manner. Prompt on appointments. Great personable staff. I would highly recommend this doctor and this facility!

resp.text: Denise, thank you so much for the kind words. Yes, I am very fortunate to have an awesome staff!

name: Lisa Frances-Settembrino
text: Dr. Waldrop is the best. I highly recommend him and Andrews!!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and for taking the time to share your experience.

name: MG Thompson
text: The BEST doctor and the BEST Team!  My family has used Dr. Waldrop and Andrews for years.  Awesome experience every time.  Thanks!

name: Marc Cormack
text: I would highly recommend Dr. Waldrop because he is an incredible surgeon, as well as a really good person. I was 61 years old when I went to see him with recurring ankle pain and swelling. These problems were due to multiple ankle sprains incurred playing sports over the years. The MRI showed it was a mess....torn tendons with bits of bone attached, arthritis, etc. He thoroughly explained the surgery that would be necessary to fix it, and we set a date. It has been 2 years since he performed the surgery, and I continue to walk without pain, and I have never had the heavy pain with swelling come back.  It couldn't have been a better experience!

name: Katherine Cobbs
text: By almost all accounts my achilles rupture repair seems perfect. I won’t be an ankle model anytime in my future, but Dr. Waldrop tells me the lump is “just the way you healed.” Some styles of shoes are a pain to wear because of it (a bummer for a gal), but at least my ankle is no longer hurting and my mobility is back to normal levels.

resp.text: Thank you, Katherine.

name: Jeremy Sumrall
text: Top notch.

resp.text: Thanks for the positive feedback!

name: Amanda Golden
text: Dr. Waldrop fixed my sons foot up perfectly. We appreciate his expertise. We didn’t really require extra time, so weren’t offended with the short visit.

name: Andy Coats
text: Dr. Waldrop did some "miracle" work on my achilles.  He discussed two options for my achilles insertional calcific tendinosis.  Surgery or PRP.  I had the PRP treatment and within 2 days my ankle was as good as new.  Many docs would have only done the surgery with a much longer recovery.  Thank you Dr. Waldrop!

name: Paisley Pineapple Boutique
text: Wonderful, friendly, thorough doctor. Did an excellent job on my ankle tendon repair and seems to be a friendly, too-notch, guy all the way around.

name: Diann Barrett
text: Dr. Waldron was awesome all around.  Office staff and all personnel very nice!  He was awesome!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Diann!

name: Mel D
text: My review is in response to the 1 star review. I have had a great experience with Dr. Waldrop and the staff at Andrews Sports medicine. I just had my 3rd follow up appt with Dr. Waldrop after my foot surgery six weeks ago. My foot is doing great! He always checks my foot himself, including doing my last X-ray himself. He personally provides instruction and maintains expectations so you are prepared and feel a bit in control. The follow up appointments are quick, which means the wait times are very short, a rarity in doctors offices. But he has always been friendly and answered my few concerns. It's all a balancing act and for me, a skilled surgeon with a great staff (who also answer emails) and very limited waiting times has been very enjoyable.

name: Michelle Black
text:
Had foot fusion by this quack.  First, the fusion was for 3-4 joints in his words would "most likely alleviate the pain".  But not until way after surgery found out he fused ankle.  I run, kayak, horseback ride, bike, well lest say I did!  Never going to be able to now!!!  He swears he tells you about recovery and what he is going to do but, do not have telepathy, because none of those wordsl never left his lips so I am assuming only in his head.  Just go to someone else and get another opinion.  Dr.cordover that works there is fantastic, I only wish instead of back and neck specialty he could have covered this.

Update since February 2018 I hurt worse than did before surgery.  Foot was put in wrong position cause waldrWa was upset taking too long and going on vacation.   I am disabled where before I some quality of life.  Now in so much pain and caused spine, hip and ect.  Nothing libes up or can have normal quality of life.

name: Stefanie Cotter
text: Dr. Waldrop was very comforting to a very nervous mom and teen!  He did a wonderful job, and we avoided surgery!

resp.text: Thank you for the kinds words and for taking the time to rate your experience.

name: Julie Price
text: Dr. Waldrop is a very arrogant and uncaring physician. His nurse practictioner takes on the same attitude, she was as crass and insulting as they come. She is that way because he is that way. There is a single word to describe her that I will for integrity sake leave out. My surgery consultation was on Thursday and he was very willing to schedule my surgery for the following Monday however would not tell me what he planned to do procedure wise. I had many uneasy feelings due to his haughty attitude but continued to ask questions so I could make a well informed decision about my surgery. He talked down to me like I was an uneducated piece of garbage and had no sense. Still trying to overlook the insults, I continued to attempt to ask questions, but was rudely shut down as he walked right out the door with me still asking for information. I was very shocked and upset about the entire experience because my family/I have always had such wonderful experiences with the doctors/surgeons of Andrews Sports Medicine. I am rather taken back that they continue to allow such a fester to be a part of their team. I left there and immediately searched for another surgeon AND facility. He now gives me apprehensions about Andrews judgement in allowing him to continue to practice there. My thoughts were, he may be a good surgeon but who in their right mind would want that hateful and uncaring of a person to DO the surgery and then be THE person they rely on for the next 6-8 months in healing/recovery. He does not deserve the one star I had to choose in doing my review. Please don’t waste your time with him. He & his nurse practitioner are NOT the caring and compassionate people that doctors and nurses are called to be.***Oh...never even saw one of the many X-rays that were taken of my foot. Never discussed it or even offered to show it to me...doubt that he even looked at it to be honest. ARROGANT MAN...not what a doctor should be. I have now learned from others who won’t take the time to post that they were treated the same way. They just moved on to other doctors because of the same exact mannerisms.

name: lisa strong
text: My experience is always great with Dr. Waldrop and his staff ! He is one of Gods blessings for me ..he's one of my angels and I thank him and his staff for helping me to walk without pain. God bless you all at Andrews Sports Medicine & Orthopaedic Center 😊

name: Kathy Christy
text: I went to St. Vincent TOC in Birmingham to get a second opinion on an ankle injury. The Dr. I saw was Dr. Norman E. Waldrop III. Dr. Waldrop was very friendly. His staff was friendly and I have only once had to wait 30 past my appointment time. Dr. Waldrop is the only surgeon that took time to listen and propose an approach that took a less invasive step first. There are times I have noticed his demeanor seems rushed, matter of fact, or less talkative but he has never been rude or talked down to me. I drive 2 hours to visit his office. My drive down is longer than my wait and visit combined. Here locally, the TOC branch has kept me waiting in the lobby 3 hours beyond my appointment time plus an additional 50 minutes in the patient room. I highly recommend Dr. Waldrop.

name: Laurie Franklin
text: I would highly recommend Dr. Waldrop, he is incredibly awesome❤️

resp.text: We’re so glad you had a great experience! Thanks for the great review!  We appreciate your review and look forward to helping you continue to heal.

name: Heath Stone
text: If I could give a negative star number, I would, because I don't think that Dr. Waldrop deserves the one start that I had to choose. He is one of the most uncompassionate people that my family has ever encountered. It's very apparent that he does not care about his patients, but only the number of patients he sees a day, and how much money he can get from them. My family drives 2 hours just to go to an appointment and within 45 seconds into the visit, he is already standing by the door with his hand on the knob, ready to leave. He has no heart for his patients and seems to be very cocky and arrogant. Once he does any type of surgery on you, and has your money, he seems to wash his hands of you, because he thinks his job is done. He is a "know-it- all" and doesn't respect his patients enough to take time to listen to questions or concerns. After several visits to him, with my mother breaking down into tears just in the hallway, we are choosing that "enough is enough!". It doesn't matter if we have to drive halfway across the state to find a new doctor,  it will be well worth it, not to ever have to deal with Dr. Waldrop again.

name: eric graham
text: Best foot and ankle Doctor & a super nice guy!  I can walk again bc of Dr. Waldrop "Thank You"!

resp.text: Thanks Eric!

name: Jimmy Frierson
text: my visit to Andrew's sports medicine was excellent

resp.text: Jimmy, we realize you have a lot of sports medicine options. We appreciate you trusting in our team.

name: Mr Pickett
text: He was very friendly and answered my questions and very confident in his ability.

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Pickett!

name: Michael Bullock
text: Dr. Waldrop is great. Glad to be in his service.

resp.text: Thank you! Fortunately, I have a great team - Heather, Tina, Shay & Halle.

name: Ann Gober

resp.text: Thanks for the great review!

name: Jayne Daly
text: Doctor Kyle is always pleasant, friendly and punctual. I have had 2 surgeries. Initial appointment, surgery and follow up appointments have been perfect. I highly recommend Dr Kyle and his staff.

name: Lori Young
text: Dr. Stanford is a nice guy and a great surgeon. His nurses are top notch. I will use him for any of my orthopedic surgery needs.

name: Shelby Lynn
text: I had my toenail removed by Dr. Kyle, and he was awesome! He was so funny and made the entire experience so much less scary! I would recommend him to anyone!!

Class Act and proud to give it a shout out!  Thank you for bringing your knowledge to Athens, Alabama.  Thank you for bringing the latest and greatest technology to our town.

name: Joe Hand SR
text: He made me feel very confident  and secure in the decision to have Hip replacement surgery even though I am 85 yrs old!!  We are going to do this!!

name: Mary Haney
text: I enjoyed meeting Dr Licht.  She very patiently explained my condition and my options, answering all of my questions.  I look forward to meeting with her again.

name: Marisol Bet-sayad
text: My experience at TOC in Athens has been great. I’ve seen Dr. Kyle for two different medical reasons and both times he has been spot on. He is also kind, a great listener, and takes his time to explain the problem. It’s a great atmosphere.

name: Cori Sibley
text: Dr. Stanford at TOC is the best! Very personable and great bedside manner! He has done surgery on my husband and myself! We will continue to see Dr. Stanford!

name: Christy Reeves

name: Bob
text: Easy to get registered once you get to the second floor. Scanned the QR code at the front desk, sat down and completed everything in comfort.  dr Hunter Boyett answered all my questions and we both agreed on the next step needed in this wellness visit.

name: Neil

name: Barbara Whitman

Really wish good ole hunter would call me personally he has my number just look it up,

Follow up: he called so now we will see how it goes

name: Melissa Haggard
text: Dr Hatfield is the best. Takes his time, ask questions and explains everything. The entire staff of TOC is awesome. I had my knee replacement done by Dr Lawrence at TOC as well

name: Vivian Morgan
text: TOC is wonderful!  Have two great doctors, Dr Stanford and Dr Lawrence.  Highly recommend this facility and doctors!

name: Ashley Pentecost Edwards
text: Athens TOC was so nice, and Dr. Kyle and his staff were kind and courteous! It was a wonderful experience!

name: Brennen Clark
text: No problem with the doctors. But the staff needs to do their job!!! They failed to call in a prescription (THAT WAS REALLY NEEDED FOR PAIN AND INFLAMMATION) before the office closed. Not a good experience.

name: Mary Grace Thacker
text: Doctor Stanford and the medical staff were amazing helpful, polite, and quick. I hardly spent any time waiting on someone to come see me. However, their reception and scheduling staff takes a very long time to get back to you and they're very rude and unhelpful.

name: Jenny Tipton
text: Dr Kyle and his staff are AMAZING!!  It is awesome to have a doctor who is super knowledgeable and a pleasure to engage with.  Keep up the great work!!!

name: Deborah Guyton
text: Best doctor around. He did my knee surgery and now my rotator cuff. Answered all my questions and was very professional

name: Rob Jackson
text: Great service was seen without appointment and very fast

name: veronica wilson
text: Great personality, great staff.  Knows what he is taking about.

name: Kelsie Gaylor
text: Very professional. Calming and very informative. Explained what he would do during surgery for my shoulder and how, helpful.

name: Tim Wise
text: I had my rotator cuff repaired today. Dr. Stanford and the whole staff were amazing. They went above and beyond to take care of me.

name: Derek Chrisman

The staff was friendly and attentive. Doctor Stanford was Personal and very knowledgeable. Doctor Stanford assisted me in formulating a management plan to a possible surgery in the future. His candor and professionalism was very much appreciated.

Thank you,

SSG Chrisman, Derek

name: Ginger Newman
text: Good didn't like the hour wait time

name: Eileen M. Terry
text: Dr. Kyle was excellent, he explained my situation in detail, and even drew me a detailed diagram of what I had done to my foot. He then gave me the choices of treatment or surgery, saying that treatment would be the best and easier choice now.

name: David Light
text: Very nice doctor. Painless cortisone injections! thanks

name: Anna Tominack
text: Dr. Stanford is very knowledgeable and answered all of my questions.  Highly recommend TOC Athens.

name: B Carter
text: Excellent and friendly assistance.  Dr. was knowledgeable and helpful.  Nice to know Athens, AL has a first rate care facility

name: Linda Carathers
text: He is always patient. listens and great.

name: Barbara Mahan
text: I was first seen by Dr. Hunter Boyett, who scheduled me for an MRI on February 22, 2021.  The next day I called to get an appt. to get the results of my MRI appt. and was informed that Dr. Hunter Boyet would be out of the office till March 15th.  I was very upset by this because had I known I had to wait 3 weeks for an appt. and hopefully a path to relieving my pain, I would’ve gone somewhere else to another doctor.  I called and asked them if I could see another doctor in the interim and was told no, only Hunter Boyett could read me the results and prescribe anything I may need.  I will never go back there,  it made me feel like my needs were not important, and that waiting 3 weeks in a lot of pain was just the breaks.  I have had many good experiences with other orthopedic doctors in the area, this was a very bad experience and I do not recommend Athens TOC.  I am from another state and had this happened in my previous state they would not be in practice very long.  Professionals should act professional and treat their patients likewise.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear about your experience. Please call us at 256-233-2332.

name: Emily Hand
text:
The appointment was for me, Joseph Hand, not my wife.  Dr Laurence and his staff of PAs and RNs are prompt, professional, caring, friendly and very
patient.  I got a "steroid" shot in my shoulder and discussed further treatment options - they took the time to talk to me in detail.  WELL DONE!

name: Nikita Coleman Nance
text: This doctor is the absolute best. You can tell he care for his patients. I’m blessed to have him as a doctor.

name: S Terry
text: This was my first visit. They are very professional and Dr. Kyle was very informative and took the time to answer all my questions.

name: LInda Templeman
text: I was so impressed with the Orthopetic Center and especially Dr. Stanford. I'm older and he was patient with me and made sure l understood my diagnosis and treatment.

name: luis saavedra
text: The Doctor William Lawrence is a very good professional, he provides solutions,  as a person is very friendly. I recommend him

name: Maleah Eaves
text: I had a procedure done. I was supposed to get a call to schedule physical therapy and a follow up appointment. I have not got a call back and it has been around 2 months. And yes, I have tried calling. Every time I call I am on hold and then I get hung up on. I also had to go to the emergency room because I called the toc twice and had no answer. Definitely do not recommend!!

name: Eric Kelley
text: Dr. Stanford and staff are top notch, friendly and just all around awesome.

name: derrick gargis
text: We absolutely love Dr. Kyle. He's done two surgeries on my son, and we would recommend him to anybody.

name: Kala Bean
text:
Update: I was able to get an by the doctor. It was a much different experience at the Huntsville clinic than the Madison office.

Long wait, crowded waiting room during a pandemic at the Madison office. My appointment took 2 hours for a few x-rays and to be told I need an MRI after a 1 min exam. I got my MRI and rescheduled my follow-up and was not told that my follow up was at a different facility than the one I initially visited, resulting in me being marked as a no call no show. Also, my follow-up appointment was scheduled at 7:15 am, which was no problem, but when I called to try to figure out why I couldn't get into the building, no one answered at either facility I called. Very disappointing.

name: Blair Noel
text: Showed up 15 mins before my 945 appointment. I filled out kiosk sat down waited its now 1025 and the girl hands me more papers to fill out. They should have handed this to me while I had been sitting for 30 mins. I don't have extra time to be wasting I needed to go to work so I left. I just need my ankle to be checked out its over a month and still have not seen a doctor for it.

name: jessica holland
text: Toc is a very good clinic they care about their patients when i went their they got right on the problem whatever was wrong with my knee its the best bone and joint clinic and Dr.Lawrence is so nice i remcommned this clinic too anyone

name: LeeAnn Reed
text: This experience was great.  All these doctors are great people and professionals.

name: Stacey Dunn
text: Edited review. I still say the wait was too long for my first two appts (2-3 hours past appt time is a tad ridiculous).  I’m letting that slide though since Dr Boyett 100% fixed me!  I’ve been in pain for 3 years. He performed a laminotomy and discectomy. I woke up and the pain was immediately gone and hasn’t returned. I guess you wait longer when you are seeing a magician. I def would have gone a long time ago if I had known.

name: Anita Rice
text: My favorite doc!  Always smiling and so caring.

name: Linda Haggermaker
text: Dr. Lawrence and the staff at TOC in Athens are great! They are very helpful and care about their patients!

name: Deborah Sweeney
text: I am very happy with your building. I did not wait to long to get in to see the doctor.

name: Doug Nelson
text: Excellent doctor and excellent staff. Could not be more satisfied with the whole process. We were treated as nice and professional as any place we have ever been! We would highly recommend Dr. Stanford and the staff to anyone who needs their services!

name: Wendy Hollander
text: He took time to listen to my concerns.

name: Terrell Swindall
text: Got an appointment quickly.  Staff and doctor experience was great.  The only recommendation to make things better is to link the online registration profile information that is entered at home to the kiosk database.  For example, I had updated my insurance information online, but it was not reflected at the kiosk upon check-in.  Other than that, good job.

name: Dane Doerflinger
text: Very efficient, Great manners, very thorough

name: Hope Kirby
text: Dr. Stanford started helping me fix my knee about 6 or 7 months ago. He got me through a surgery and did an amazing job of it. Unfortunately my knee is in pretty bad shape and we are headed to a total knee replacement. He is doing everything he can to extend the time to keep me from having this surgery right now. He has the best bed side manner of any Dr I have ever used before and he really listens to everything I have to say. He is so sweet to me and gentle with my knee. I know a total knee replacement is in my near future but I know with him taking care of it I will make it through. He is an amazing dr. I won't use anyone else if i can help it. He walks me through everything every step of the way and he calms me before a surgery. It's a relief to know if I'm having a surgery that it's him behind the mask. He is everything a Dr should strive to be. We love Dr Stanford! He works miracles.

name: Lorinda Spencer
text: Dr Hatfield and Dr Stanford are excellent doctors and TOC Athens provides exceptional care. Their staff is friendly from the receptionist to the doctors. They are attentive and I would recommend them to everyone.

name: dawn calder
text: Dr. Hatfield and his staff are amazing. He expresses concern and listens to you. The staff are so professional and show such kindness. The first day I saw him and had a broken foot I was in tears because my son was getting married September 30. Dr. Hatfield reassured me he would take care of me and do all he could to help in the recovery phase. He also helped me to avoid surgery by continuing with a cast for 10 weeks. Yes, it was a long time being in the cast but I avoided surgery and will make it to my son's wedding. If I should ever need an orthopedic again I will return to him. Wonderful experience!

name: Dustin Bates
text: Highly recommended.  Knowledgeable, friendly, detailed, patient and fast.  Explained everything in great detail.  Same day cast.  In and out in about 1hr.  On time and efficient.  Very friendly staff.

name: Diana Isom
text:
They’re great. I had right knee surgery last year with Dr.Boyett and he was great!
Now next Thursday I got to have surgery on my left.
They’re very nice and professional people!

name: Paige Conway
text: I highly recommend Doctor Stanford. He did a great job with my ankle surgery. He is a kind person. He is professional but one can tell that he cares about his patients. He is never in a rush, as so many doctors often convey that they are hurried.  The Physical Therapy group that is rehabilitating patients is on the same floor as his office. They are also excellent.

name: Lynne Moseley
text:
Well managed practice - I was seen within 5 minute of my appointment times every time I was there.  All staff are very friendly and helpful.

I have had 2 surgical procedures (back and knee) with 2 different doctors and have absolutely had pleasant experiences both times.

This is a class act practice

name: Andy George
text: Great staff, doctors and facilities.

name: BAMAJ
text: Love Dr. Lawrence and staff. From the time I checked  in until I left , I was treated with kindness and respect. Whatever the reason, I never felt that my issue was considered less of a problem than someone else. I highly recommend TOC for all of your orthopedic needs.

name: martha jones
text: Perfect!! Did exactly what I needed! Couldn't have even one complaint! You people know your stuff and know how to solve the problem!! Very happy not to hurt ANY MORE!! THANKS SO VERY MUCH!! 😁

name: Tamara Gardner
text: I am very happy with the care I have received from Dr Eric Stanford.  He is very professional and has an awesome bed side personality! I would definitely recommend The Orthopedic Center and Dr Eric Standard.

name: Kim Chaney
text: From Kim Cantrell Chaney: Dr Boyett and his staff are patient, thoughtful, and caring. They take their time to answer all of my questions and concerns. I would highly recommend him.

name: Anna Perry
text: I have to say Dr.Standford is the best dr I have ever seen. The best bedside manner.  Don't stop ti he gets to the bottom of the problem.  Thanks for your help

name: Sheila Jackson
text: This place was awesome.Everyone help me when needed.Appt.set up quickly. Knowledgement of their jobs. This place knows what they're doing and they are very experienced a polite.I would be glad to go back.

name: Billy Ward
text: Today was my first visit. I was extremely  impressed with Dr. Lawrence and all of the our staff member. I would highly recommend this clinic my friends and family.

name: BB2 Beauty & The Beast
text: The doctor and staff showed empathy about my illness and this was the first time I have been made to feel this way out of all the doctors who treated me at other locations.  I was traumatized and the doctor and staff showed compassion and provided me with a wonderful platform towards rehabilitation.  I couldn't see the light at the end of the tunnel but with their guidance I have made progress and for that I want to say thank you and may God bless you all.

name: Stephanie Allen
text: A nice, new facility. Plenty of parking. I was taken on time. Dr. Hatfield was kind and knowledgeable. He listened and asked if I had any questions.

name: Pamela Baldo
text: Very informative and friendly

name: Tye Pickett
text: The whole experience was unlike any other surgery I've ever had this staff is in a class above the rest I felt like there care was genuine and not just to make you just another number or just another surgery under there belt to get paid for they really care about getting me better and they listen to you instead of just telling you what they want you to do. Only problem I have with the staff is they really could have warned me that I might wake up with a catheter still in that was a experience I'll remember as long as i live LOL I will refer all my family and friends to TOC in Athens without hesitation. I really love my doctor he is really down to earth and doesn't seem to act like he is above you because he is a surgeon he has a real humbling attitude about him. He told me from day one not to worry that he got me I'm in good hands I truly believe that now. Keep up the great work guys

name: Beverly Criddle
text: Nice dr

name: Stephen Gleim
text: TOC services is top notch. The staff is courtesy, professional, and friendly!! Doctor Stanford is highly rated and very caring towards his patients. I highly recommend Doctor Stanford's services!!

name: Phyllis Fournier
text: Everyone was very friendly and attentive.I didn't have to wait very long at all to be seen.Dr Standford ask questions and listen to my concerns.

name: Sue Martin
text: Dr. Stanford was absolutely amazing with my son's ankle surgery. Will definitely see him again if ever need too.

name: Kristi Jones
text: Dr Lawrence is a professional doctor and good at his job with a very nice and friendly personality. I would recommend him to anyone!

name: Jennifer Stovall
text: Dr. Lawrence was amazing and the staff was very professional. I never wait very long to actually see the doctor which is great. Usually in and out within an hour depending on what’s being done that visit

name: Cheryl Lewter
text: Love the entire staff at TOC! Thanks to Dr. Stanford for making my daughter comfortable.

name: Charles Brock
text: I have been dealing with the TOC for years starting with Dr Greco, Clark and now Blake Boyette. Their the best, they care, listen and treat you like a person now a cash cow.  I recommend them every time I come in contact with anyone needing orthopedic care. I look forward to starting the last leg of this back surgery the PT. Dr. being and ole country boy from Marion and Lamar county sure helped

name: Lindsey Keith
text: They are very professional yet welcoming. I was seen in a timely manner and the nurses and doctor took very good care of me

name: James Couch
text: The staff were extremely friendly and helpful and doctor Stanford was professional,  knowledgeable,  courteous and very helpful.  I would recommend to anyone.

name: Chrissy B
text: Dr. Stanford is by far the BEST orthopedic surgeon I have seen. I would recommend him to anyone. He is the first doctor who actually said there was something wrong with my knee, and he fixed it. It is healing up amazing and he is very great with keeping up with my progress. Please, if you need an Ortho consult, he is the man to go see!

name: Glenda David
text: Love Dr. Stanford and the staff at TOC, would not want to go anywhere else!

name: Tina Millard
